sentence: Refrigerator was not cold enough to keep items in the freezer frozen and the frig part was not cold
Tiny room with no room on one side to get past the bed
Extremely rusty medicine cabinet in bathroom

This hotel is not worth the money the stay was OK so far for the location but the room had the following issues like bathroom with many wall defects painting bad water drain in the shower room ventilation by a small window which could be opened but did not stayopen old and noicy aircondition you could nealy feel the spring in the matres door was very difficult to close open was not adjusted no room service in the bathrom no cafe pads no shampoos etc only for the first night no WiFi at the room only in the area of the hotel reception Ice machine was only allowed to use for the small white container not even for smaller coolers
The rooms however were quite clean and I would rate this an average stay
NO PHONE IN THE ROOM CLOSES AT 10PM EVERYNIGHT AND NO FOOD SERVED OR NEAR
The inability to cancel your reservation at any time is a big red flag that should not be overlooked
Large garbage can right outside our room
Door handle in bathroom was loose
Very old furnishings TV was pre flat screen
Was clean and had beautiful view of ocean
Rooms are clearly newly renovated and very clean and comfortable
There are good muffins pastries and coffee in a nice room and you are free to help yourself
We recently stayed at four hotels in the Florida Keys Lime Tree Bay Resort Tranquility Bay Ocean Pointe Suites at Ke Largo and the Fisher Inn
It was on the beach with a beautiful ocean view
The beds was comfortable bathroom was pristine and other small amenities made me feel like it was a home away from home
We also enjoyed the ping pong table corn hole and beach chairs overlooking the Atlantic
Nice but avoid room 115
The room was big and clean with two double beds and a kitchen area
They upgraded our room complimentary
